13 struct GameSettings {
14  using Msg = rj_msgs::msg::GameSettings;
15 
16  GameSettings() = default;
17 
18  // Whether or not we're in simulation.
19  bool simulation = true;
20 
21  // Requests. These can be overridden by the referee if it's enabled
22  bool request_blue_team = true;
23  int request_goalie_id = 0;
24 
25  // Defend the plus-x direction in vision
26  bool defend_plus_x = true;
27 
28  bool use_our_half = true;
29  bool use_their_half = true;
30 
31  bool paused = false;

33  struct JoystickConfig {
34  int manual_id = -1;
35  bool damped_translation = true;
36  bool damped_rotation = true;
37  bool use_kick_on_break_beam = false;
38  bool use_field_oriented_drive = false;
39  };

41  JoystickConfig joystick_config;

44 namespace rj_convert {
45 
46 template <>
47 struct RosConverter<GameSettings, GameSettings::Msg> {
48  static GameSettings::Msg to_ros(const GameSettings& from) {
49  GameSettings::Msg to;
50  convert_to_ros(from.simulation, &to.simulation);
51  convert_to_ros(from.request_blue_team, &to.request_blue_team);
52  convert_to_ros(from.request_goalie_id, &to.request_goalie_id);
53  convert_to_ros(from.defend_plus_x, &to.defend_plus_x);
54  convert_to_ros(from.use_our_half, &to.use_our_half);
55  convert_to_ros(from.use_their_half, &to.use_their_half);
56  return to;
57  }
58 
59  static GameSettings from_ros(const GameSettings::Msg& from) {
60  GameSettings to;
61  convert_to_ros(from.simulation, &to.simulation);
62  convert_to_ros(from.request_blue_team, &to.request_blue_team);
63  convert_to_ros(from.request_goalie_id, &to.request_goalie_id);
64  convert_to_ros(from.defend_plus_x, &to.defend_plus_x);
65  convert_to_ros(from.use_our_half, &to.use_our_half);
66  convert_to_ros(from.use_their_half, &to.use_their_half);
67  return to;
68  }
69 };
